description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5hghi","text":"This protocol is intended to dissociate and fix cells of the hydrozoan Podocoryna carnea for single-cell RNA sequencing on the 10X Chromium platform following a FACS sorting step. ACME-fixed Podocoryna cells maintain their morphology for use in microscopy and can also be frozen at -20C for storage and/or shipping.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":71,"length":17},{"style":"italic","offset":191,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"7892s","text":"Gloves","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fr063","text":"70% ethanol spray bottle","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e78kj","text":"Glass dishes and petri dishes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2on4","text":"0.2 um filtered seawater","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a23ta","text":"Menthol crystals","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fts96","text":"Glass Pasteur pipettes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca2tu","text":"Razor blades","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87ee0","text":"Microdissection razor and forceps","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mgi8","text":"Dissecting microscope","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"i3pb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3etip","text":"15 mL and 50 mL Falcon tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ikec","text":"N-acetyl cysteine powder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pv7i","text":"4 M MgCl2 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":8,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jnpb","text":"Glacial acetic acid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3984e","text":"Methanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2bc60","text":"DEPC H2O","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":6,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94pef","text":"Glycerol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28md4","text":"1X PBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5h5ss","text":"BSA powder","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"usk9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qs5o","text":"Microcentrifuge","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7egg2","text":"Ice bucket","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bu59","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ng6r","text":"p1000 and p200 pipettes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"65v8p","text":"Standard and wide-bore p1000 tips, p200 tips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fpkts","text":"Lo-Bind 1.5 mL/2.0 mL Eppendorf tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c80gn","text":"100 um, 40 um pluriSelect cell strainers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fklm8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3flre","text":"Hoechst/DRAQ-5 nuclear stain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6t62n","text":"Wheat germ agglutinin/Concanavalin-5 cytoplasm stain","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7k1k2","text":"Concave well microscope slides and coverslips","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8utnd","text":"Compound fluorescent microscope with camera","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9svsp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j2g8","text":"5 mL FACS tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lfk7","text":"FACS instrument (ie. BD FACSymphony S6)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working to produce scRNAseq datasets with ~500 - 3,500 cells per sample. Further optimization is expected.

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0b87","text":"Prepare for polyp dissection by placing a microscope slide with a Podocoryna colony in a glass dish with ~200 mL 0.2 um filtered seawater. Add menthol crystals at a concentration of ~1 g/L to relax the polyps for ~10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":66,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1t30j","text":"Collect as many medusae as possible using glass Pasteur pipettes. Place medusae in a petri dish with ~5 mL 0.2 um filtered seawater, and collect medusae to the center by gently swirling the dish in a circular motion. At least 300-500 medusae are recommended for good cell yields.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dhrkb","text":"Prepare 20 mL of fresh ACME buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vgka","text":"13 mL DEPC H2O","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":12,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gdcu","text":"2 mL glacial acetic acid","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kbn1","text":"3 mL methanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5b931","text":"2 mL glycerol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62ec5","text":"Store in 1 mL aliquots at -20C if necessary","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49ikj","text":"Transfer 50 polyps to a 1.5 mL tube for each dissociation reaction. Centrifuge tubes at ~10,000 rcf for 30 sec to collect polyps at the bottom of the tube, then remove as much seawater as possible with a p1000 or p200.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ainm","text":"Transfer ~100 medusae to a 1.5 mL tube for each dissociation reaction. Centrifuge tubes at ~10,000 rcf for 30 sec to collect medusae at the bottom of the tube, then remove as much seawater as possible with a p1000 or p200.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tvtg","text":"Stain cells in 900 uL PBS with 5 uL of wheat germ agglutinin and 1 uL of Hoechst. Vortex tube(s) and leave covered in the dark on ice for 30-60 mins. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9vfun","text":"Prepare 15 mL of 4% MgCl2 and N-acetyl cysteine (N-Ac) wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":24,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eibb6","text":"13.5 mL of 0.2 um filtered seawater","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7m2sn","text":"1.125 g of N-Ac powder","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etuon","text":"1.5 mL of 4M MgCl2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":17,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e29c6","text":"Use a clean razor blade to separate the Podocoryna colony from the microscrope slide, removing the stolon and polyps together. Dissect relaxed polyps from the stolon using a clean microdissection blade and forceps, then collect the polyps into a petri dish use a glass Pasteur pipette. Transfer as little seawater and debris as possible. Approximately 300 polyps are recommended for good cell yields.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":40,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6526k","text":"Add 100 uL of the N-Ac wash buffer. Immediately, centrifuge tubes at ~10,000 rcf for 30 sec to collect polyps, then remove as much liquid as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7plta","text":"Add 1 mL of ACME buffer to start the ACME dissociation. Allow ACME to permeate the tissues for 1 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99s13","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b24bs","text":"Next, begin pipetting using a wide-bore p1000 tip set to 500 uL volume. Pipette at the top of the ACME liquid, aim to create small air bubbles and a \"foam\" that will disrupt the tissue. Avoid pipetting polyps into the tip, as they can become lodged above where the liquid will reach. Pipette for 1 min, then rest for 30 sec on ice, repeat 10 times for a total of 15 minutes of dissociation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7q6pe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58u28","text":"Alternatively, use a vortex at max speed for 5 sec at 30 sec intervals for 15 mins. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13i6v","text":"Prepare pluriSelect cell strainers above a new 1.5 mL tube, with a 100 um strainer above a 40 um strainer. Pass 1 mL of ACME buffer containing dissociated cells through the paired strainers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ccsh","text":"Centrifuge tubes at 1,200 rcf for 5 min at 4C to collect dissociated cells, then aspirate 1 mL ACME buffer and resuspend pellet in 200 uL 1X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4omdj","text":"Prepare an ice cooler for the ACME dissociation steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfj9k","text":"Prepare 15 mL of 4% MgCl2 in filtered seawater.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":24,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bv7gl","text":"13.5 mL of 0.2 um filtered seawater","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqlc9","text":"1.5 mL of 4M MgCl2","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":17,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"us71","text":"Add 500 uL of the 4% MgCl2 seawater and place tube on ice for 5-15 minutes. Centrifuge tubes at ~10,000 rcf for 30 sec to collect polyps, then remove as much liquid as possible (make a note if this relaxation step is omitted).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":25,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvs2c","text":"Verify that polyp tissues have dissociated and a single-cell suspension has been achieved. Small tissue chunks are acceptable but whole polyps should not be visible. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8l57c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94rmf","text":"At this point, it is optional to centrifuge tubes at 1,200 rcf for 5 min at 4C to collect dissociated cells, then aspirate 1 mL ACME buffer and resuspend pellet in 200 uL 1X PBS. Place 50 uL in a well slide and view cells under a microscope to confirm dissociation quality (stain with 0.5 uL Hoechst for 30 mins if preferred).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6hgpu","text":"Concatenate all resuspended cells into 1-2 tubes, with 600-800 uL of cells per tube. Centrifuge tube(s) at 1,200 rcf for 5 min at 4C, aspirate supernatant and resuspend pellet in 900 uL 1X PBS. Proceed directly to cell staining and FACS steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"afplq","text":"Centrifuge tube(s) at 1,200 rcf for 5 min at 4C, aspirate supernatant and resuspend pellet in 450 uL 1X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dve3c","text":"Place 50 uL from each tube in a well slide and view cells under a fluorescent microscope to confirm dissociation and staining quality. Take photos to document cell morphology and viability, if possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96asj","text":"If satisfied with dissociated cells, combine into a single 5 mL coated FACS tube (~800 uL if using 2 tubes) and proceed to FACS sorting. Sort cells into a 5 mL coated FACS tube with 100 uL 1X PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vb5n","text":"To collect sorted cells, centrifuge FACS tube at 1,200 rcf for 10 min at 4C, aspirate supernatant and resuspend pellet in 900 uL 1X PBS. Add 100 uL DMSO (10%, adjust volume as necessary) and freeze at -80C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lli7","text":"Prepare FACS tubes for cell sorting by coating with 5% BSA in 1X PBS. Only empty tubes of coating solution immediately prior to sorting, do not allow them to dry out. For 50 mL 5% BSA in PBS, add 2.5 g BSA to 50 mL tube with 40 mL PBS, dissolve for 10 mins at 4C, then fill to 50 mL total.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4gpqv","text":"Add 500 uL of the 4% MgCl2 seawater and place tube on ice for 5-15 minutes. Centrifuge tubes at ~10,000 rcf for 30 sec to collect medusae, then remove as much liquid as possible (make a note if this relaxation step is omitted).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":25,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ktr9","text":"Add 100 uL of the N-Ac wash buffer. Immediately, centrifuge tubes at ~10,000 rcf for 30 sec to collect medusae, then remove as much liquid as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"846na","text":"Add 1 mL of ACME buffer to start the ACME dissociation. Allow ACME to permeate the tissues for 1 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66lcq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68etq","text":"Next, begin pipetting using a wide-bore p1000 tip set to 500 uL volume. Pipette at the top of the ACME liquid, aim to create small air bubbles and a \"foam\" that will disrupt the tissue. Avoid pipetting medusae into the tip, as they can become lodged above where the liquid will reach. Pipette for 1 min, then rest for 30 sec on ice, repeat 10 times for a total of 15 minutes of dissociation. STOP after 4 or more rounds if tissues appear completely dissociated!","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42uvs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkdsb","text":"Alternatively, use a vortex at max speed for 5 sec at 30 sec intervals for 15 mins. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2te2m","text":"Verify that medusae have dissociated and a single-cell suspension has been achieved. Small tissue chunks are acceptable but whole polyps should not be visible. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6bli","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bfd98","text":"At this point, it is optional to centrifuge tubes at 1,200 rcf for 5 min at 4C to collect dissociated cells, then aspirate 1 mL ACME buffer and resuspend pellet in 200 uL 1X PBS. Place 50 uL in a well slide and view cells under a microscope to confirm dissociation quality (stain with 0.5 uL Hoechst for 30 mins if preferred).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dgrpa","text":"Prepare pluriSelect cell strainers above a new 1.5 mL tube, with a 100 um strainer above a 40 um strainer. Pass 1 mL of ACME buffer containing dissociated cells through the paired strainers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"519ae","text":"Centrifuge tubes at 1,200 rcf for 5 min at 4C to collect dissociated cells, then aspirate 1 mL ACME buffer and resuspend pellet in 200 uL 1X PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"13ibm","text":"Concatenate all resuspended cells into 1-2 tubes, with 600-800 uL of cells per tube. Centrifuge tube(s) at 1,200 rcf for 5 min at 4C, aspirate supernatant and resuspend pellet in 900 uL 1X PBS. Proceed directly to cell staining and FACS steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cbdqp","text":"Wear gloves for each step of protocol, clean bench spaces with RNase away and 70% ethanol prior to start.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Podocoryna ACME cell dissociations - draft v1.0, May 13 2024
